nodes.text: The xandank lance was a melee weapon in the form of a polearm which saw use during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It shared the same name as the xandank creature.

Xandank lances appeared in Trials of Obi-Wan, a 2005 expansion pack for the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
